answer0.description: The child does not yet make any attempt or is not yet able to carry out the behavior.

answer1.description: The child shows first attempts to perform the behavior, but still deviates considerably from the description and/or is very insecure.

answer2.description: The child has mastered the behavior in principle, but rarely shows it, is still slightly unsure, or does not carry it out completely correctly.

answer3.description: The child demonstrates the behavior several times safely and exactly as described.
